text: Apani bale dina, ami amara nijera kalyana sadhanera ebam akalyana sadhanera malika na'i, kintu ya allaha cana. Ara ami yadi gayabera katha jene nite paratama, tahale bahu mangala arjana kare nite paratama, phale amara kona amangala kakhana'o hate parata na. Ami to sudhumatra ekajana bhiti pradarsaka o susambadadata imanadaradera jan'ya.
